name: Prana Metric E-Waist Zip Shorts - Men's
description:
Soft, quick-drying fabric, comfy fit and an attractive finish mean you'll keep these swim shorts on all day. The cool-wash fade gives the Metric Shorts a vintage look.Fabric blend wicks moisture, dries quickly and feels soft next to skin, with a hint of stretch.DWR finish keeps you drier for longer.Elastic waist with tubular drawcord provides a secure and comfortable fit.Back pocket with zip closure offers secure storage.
